verbose_text: The first attempt of the VIRADEL method to concentrate enterovirus can be traced back to the 1960s when XREF_BIBR found the addition of sodium chloride (NaCl) or magnesium chloride (MgCl 2) can lead to the adsorption of poliovirus on cellulose nitrate HA membranes (0.45 mum).
evidence: lead to the adsorption of poliovirus on cellulose nitrate HA
